resources.string:
This application uses the GitHub GraphQL API, to be able to use it you need to login to your GitHub account. The application will ask your permission to read your GitHub public data, and some private ones. Note that we do not store any private data on any servers.
Keep in mind that this is not an official GitHub application.
Recommendations for people to contact based on your message history
